name: The Factory (Itch.io edition)
description:
after looking at your misrable life and searching for a job you decide to look at the news paper and find something there when you see an article:¨hiring at bronzys factory! call this number!¨ after calling in they accept you, now you gotta drive a long highway to the place,after entering you noitice there are animatronics!, after a few hours they start to move! shut the doors or either hide in a locker! and also make sure to wind the music box! and watch out for the toxicity bar when in locker! its quite toxic get it?, anyways have a good night.
